attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is now clear that the bombing campaign against Serbia in 1999 was an ill-conceived interference in the internal affairs of a sovereign nation in support of islamo-fascist separatist terrorist gangs in the province of Kosovo and Metohija.  In order to prevent the emergence of a failed state in the Balkans that will be a haven for criminal gangs and Jihadists, and to uphold the principals of international law and national sovereignty, the British government should oppose independence for Kosovo.
